FuncDef:
The destination command creates a leaf node in a leaf list.
The undo destination command deletes leaf nodes in a leaf list.
By default, no leaf node is created in a leaf list.

ParaDef.Info:
Leaf Address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The VRP supports the way of using a leaf list to configure and manage leaf nodes on a P2MP TE tunnel. The destination command creates and modifies leaf nodes in a leaf list. The undo destination command deletes leaf nodes in a leaf list.
Prerequisites
A leaf list has been configured using the mpls te leaf-list command.
Follow-up Procedure
(Optional) Run the path command to configure explicit paths for the created leaf nodes.
